lines.Line:
This kitty is Mittens, this one is Fitzhugh, and this little guy 
in the cat condo is Jinkys
Yeah. That’s a lot of cats, Jolene. Single, are ya

[On phone] Hey. How come you’re answering your own phone? Where’s your 
crazy assistant

lines.Character:
[Chandler jumps up to turn the speaker phone off by lifting the receiver. The 
Assistant looks shocked, then storms of
lines.Line:
Chandler jumps up to turn the speaker phone off by lifting the receiver. The 
Assistant looks shocked, then storms off

lines.Character:
[Joey’s apartment. Conversation switches between the two scenes when each 
person speak
lines.Line:
Joey’s apartment. Conversation switches between the two scenes when each 
person speaks
Okay. What have we wanted to always do together
Braid each other’s hair then ride horseback on the beach

No, no, no. When you get home tomorrow night, you and I are gonna be at 
the Wizards – Knicks game courtside

Yeah, maybe Michael Jordan will dive for the ball and break my jaw with 
his knee
That is so cool. I’ll let Monica know

lines.Character:
[Chandler’s office, Tulsa – Conversation switches between the two scenes when 
the people are talkin
lines.Line:
Chandler’s office, Tulsa – Conversation switches between the two scenes when 
the people are talking

Joey just called. He’s got courtside Knicks tickets for me and him 
tomorrow night

Really? But tomorrow night’s the only one I get off from the 
restaurant. If you go to the game then we won’t have another night together for 
a week

But-t it’s courtside! The cheerleaders are gonna be right in … 
[mouths last words so Monica does not hear them]. That’s not the way to convince 
you

Look. I don’t want to be one of those wives that says “You can’t go 
to the game”, “you have to spend time with me”, so, if you just realize it on 
your own

I…I…I know. You’re right. I wanna see you too. I’ve just got to 
figure out a way to tell Joey. He’s really looking forward to this

[On phone] Tell him you haven’t seen your wife in a long time. [In 
apartment] Tell him that having a long-distance relationship is really 
difficult. Tell him that…what little time that we have is precious
Yeah, yeah, yeah. I’ll think of something
Yeah, yeah, yeah. I’ll think of something

2.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler’s apartment. Monica has a bottle of red wine on 
the table, along with two filled glasses. Chandler bursts through the door 
quickly, pulling his suitcase along with him

lines.Line: Chandler closes and locks the door

Well, it’s great, well, I’m just wearing the same thing underneath! 
Look at you

lines.Character: [Monica and Chandler hug and kiss. Loud bang outsid
lines.Line: Monica and Chandler hug and kiss. Loud bang outside
Ooh. Hey, how come you door’s locked
Ooh. Hey, how come you door’s locked

No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no. Joey can’t know that I am 
here

Because I didn’t know how to tell him that I couldn’t go to the 
Knicks game, so I just told him that I had to stay in Tulsa

Eh, it is always better to lie than to have the complicated 
discussion. [Monica glares at him] Except with you
Hey! Open the door! What’s going on

lines.Character: [Knock. Monica opens the door slightly. Chandler sneaks behind i
lines.Line: Knock. Monica opens the door slightly. Chandler sneaks behind it
Why are you dressed like that

[Nervous giggle] Because I, erm, well, Chandler’s gonna be home in a 
couple of days, so I thought that I would just, er, practice the art of 
seduction
I thought I heard a man’s voice before

I was just doing Chandler’s side of the conversation, y’know like 
“Hi”, “How do I look” [In Chandler’s voice] “Really sexy”, “Could I be any more 
turned on?

lines.Character:
[Chandler slaps Monica on the shoulder. Monica slaps him back. It hurts 
Chandle
lines.Line:
Chandler slaps Monica on the shoulder. Monica slaps him back. It hurts 
Chandler
Woah, woah, woah. Why are there two glasses of wine out
Woah, woah, woah. Why are there two glasses of wine out

Because, one of them is for you! [Monica goes to get a glass. 
Chandler looks at Joey through the peep-hole and Chandler ducks. Monica comes 
back to the door with the two glasses of red wine. Gives one to Joey. ‘Clinks’ 
the glasses together] Okay, bye, bye

You know, it’s funny. I’ve been practising the art of seduction as 
well! Hya! [Does a wiggle
Yeah. [Chandler’s phone goes off] It’s Joey

lines.Character:
[Chandler presses a button on the phone and puts the phone up to his ear to 
listen. Monica puts her ear by it too
lines.Line:
Chandler presses a button on the phone and puts the phone up to his ear to 
listen. Monica puts her ear by it too.

lines.Character: [Joey’s apartment. Scenes change when the different people spea
lines.Line: Joey’s apartment. Scenes change when the different people speak
Look, I can’t. What’s going on

I don’t know how to tell you this, but I think that Monica’s cheating 
on ya! I told you that you shouldn’t have married someone much hotter than you! 
[Chandler looks at Monica. They nod then put their ears back to the phone. Joey 
walks out of his apartment and up to Monica’s door] Right, look. If you can’t 
come home and deal with this, then I'm gonna

lines.Character: [Chandler starts to freak out on the spo
lines.Line: Chandler starts to freak out on the spot
Right. Just stay there. I'm coming home

Great. I’ll see you when you get here. I’m gonna wait out in the hall 
in case the dude comes out

Absolutely. You’d do it for me! Not that you’d ever have to, ‘cos I 
know how to keep my women completely satisfied

3.SceneDescription: A bar. Phoebe and Rachel are carrying drinks

lines.Line:
Oh, god. Do you remember the girls’ nights that we used to have? 
Sitting around, talking about you and Ross
Oh, god. It seems like forever ago
So what’s going on with you and Ross

Well, um, I don’t know. I mean, for a long time, nothing. You know, 
actually, right before you picked me up, Ross and I had a little thing
Woah! Oh my god! I love things! What happened

Well, um, first he told me that he liked how I looked, and then, erm, 
we had a little, erm, eye contact
I hope you were using protection

lines.Character:
[A waiter comes over with two drinks on his tray. He places them on the 
tabl
lines.Line:
A waiter comes over with two drinks on his tray. He places them on the 
table

Excuse me, um, these are from the two gentlemen at the end of the 
bar

lines.Character: [The waiter leaves. Phoebe and Rachel look to see who it i
lines.Line: The waiter leaves. Phoebe and Rachel look to see who it is

Should we send them something back? Yes, let’s do! Let’s send them 
mashed potatoes!

No, wait, don’t do that! It’s gonna make them think that they can 
come over here

We’re not here to meet guys. You have a boyfriend. I have a…baby and 
a Ross

Yeah, but, um, nothing has to happen. Just having fun. You know, not 
everything has to go as far as ‘eye contact’

4.SceneDescription:
Ross and Rachel’s apartment. There is a nearly-empty pizza box on the 
table. Mike and Ross have swapped positions on the couch. Mike still has a 
bottle of Foster’s in his hand. He is making funny noises. Ross looks bored. 
Mike stops making the noise, looks at Ross, looks back at the bottle and 
continues to make the noise. Ross looks exasperated

5.SceneDescription:
Ross and Rachel’s apartment. Ross and Mile look bored out of their 
heads

lines.Line: Okay. Thanks, er, for the beer

lines.Character: [Ross opens door. Mike steps out through door. Ross closes doo
lines.Line: Ross opens door. Mike steps out through door. Ross closes door
Ohh. [Relieved to be out of there

lines.Character:
[Bar. Phoebe is on the other end of the phone. Scenes switch with the 
conversatio
lines.Line:
Bar. Phoebe is on the other end of the phone. Scenes switch with the 
conversation
Hey Mike, it’s me. Listen: Is Ross near you
Well, you have to go back in
What? Go back? To the land where time stands still

I’m so sorry, honey, but, okay. Rachel gave this guy her number, and, 
erm, she does not want Ross to answer the phone, so you have to intercept all of 
his calls
[To Rachel] He says that he can’t do tha

Oh, give me. [Rachel takes the phone of Phoebe] Hi, Mike! Hi, listen, 
I know this is a lot to ask, but you know what. If you do this, ah, Phoebe will 
do anything you want. Seriously, I’m talking dirty stuff

Alright, give it here. [Phoebe takes the phone] Hello? I'm sorry 
about her, but, she wasn’t wrong about the dirty stuff

Alright, I’ll do it. [Phoebe sticks her thumb up to Rachel] Really, 
though, how much dirtier can it get

6.SceneDescription:
Hallway between Monica/Chandler’s apartment and Joey’s apartment. 
Joey is sat on a stool, holding a baseball bat. Chandler runs up the stairs

lines.Line:
Wow, that didn’t take long. I thought you said Tulsa was a three-hour 
flight
Well,… you’re forgetting about the time difference

lines.Character:
[Joey looks puzzled for a second, then smiles and points at Chandler. 
Chandler smiles and points back. Chandler opens the door to his apartment and 
enters. Joey follows
lines.Line:
Joey looks puzzled for a second, then smiles and points at Chandler. 
Chandler smiles and points back. Chandler opens the door to his apartment and 
enters. Joey follows.
That’s right. Your husband’s home, so now the sex can stop
Joey said that you’re in here with another man

There's no man in here! How dare you accuse me of that? [Slaps 
Chandler

Alright, alright. Then maybe you won’t mind if me and my friend takes a 
look around then. Huh! Where you at

lines.Character: [Joey goes into Monica and Chandler’s bedroom. Banging can be hear
lines.Line: Joey goes into Monica and Chandler’s bedroom. Banging can be heard
I arranged some pillows on the bed to make it look like a guy
Bedroom’s clear, although you might need some new pillows
Alright, well, I’ll check the guest bedroom

lines.Character:
[Chandler heads off to guest bedroom. Joey walks up to Monica and starts 
sniffing loudly and heavil
lines.Line:
Chandler heads off to guest bedroom. Joey walks up to Monica and starts 
sniffing loudly and heavily
Why do I smell men’s cologne
Why do I smell men’s cologne
Oh yeah, I rubbed a magazine on myself earlier

I can’t believe you thought I was cheating. You owe me an 
apology
You’re right, Monica. I’m so sorry

It’s an honest mistake. It can happen to anybody. Alright, see 
ya

lines.Character: [Monica pushes Joey towards the door. Joey sees Chandler’s case
lines.Line: Monica pushes Joey towards the door. Joey sees Chandler’s cases

Wait, wait, wait a minute. If you’ve just got back from Tulsa, how did 
your suitcase beat you here

I climb down the fire escape, and you can’t put that in the 
closet

7.SceneDescription: Monica and Chandler’s apartment. As before

lines.Line:
I’m sorry. I told you that I was in Tulsa because I wanted to spend 
the night with Monica and I didn’t…didn’t know…didn’t think you’d 
understand

What? You think I’m too dumb to know that a husband needs to be with 
his wife? Uh? You think I’m like, duhhh! [Taps head with baseball bat – it hurts 
him
I don’t know what to say. We shouldn’t have lied to you

I feel so bad. Is there, is there anything I can do to make it up 
to you

You could go to the game with me, even though I know you said you 
couldn’t, but then you lied to me, tricked me and gave me a bump on the 
head

I’m sorry. That’s the one thing I can’t do. I promised that I’d be 
with Monica
You should go to the game. It’s okay, I want you to
Really? Are you going to be okay
Really? Are you going to be okay

Yeah, it’ll be fine. Y’know, maybe I’ll stay and practice the art of 
seduction
You’re gonna put sweats on and clean, aren’t ya
Thanks. Listen, I’m never gonna lie to you again
And I want you to know that no-one thinks that you are stupid

Thanks, man. [They walk down the hall. Chandler looks at his ticket. 
Turns around and heads back to his apartment.] Where ya going

8.SceneDescription: Central Perk. Phoebe and Mike are sat on the sofa. Ross enters

lines.Line: I’ll be right back. I just have to go to the bathroom

lines.Character: [Phoebe gets up and heads for the bathroo
lines.Line: Phoebe gets up and heads for the bathroom
Stout. That’s a kind of beer
